page.title: 04LOCAL HISTORY
page.content:
{Arnside Tower
Although now a crumbling ruin, Arnside Tower is the oldest building in the area. Its date is not known but there is a recorded to reference to its existence in 1517 although it is probably much older than that. It was badly damaged by fire in 1602 and has remained a ruin ever since. It was built like a border pele tower with a base some 15m square with an impressive turret and spiral stairway. It commanded an strong position and would have been easy to defend had the need arisen.
